2571.name: ACCOUNT_ID_ALREADY_EXISTS
2571.message:
The Nintendo Network ID you
entered is already in use.

Please try again
2571.short_description: You are trying to create a PNID using a username that is either already in use by another Pretendo user, or is used by a different NNID on your console.
2571.long_description: You are trying to create a PNID using a username that is either already in use by another Pretendo user, or is used by a different NNID on your console.
